scripts.dev: ENDPOINT=$(npm run get-endpoint-dev  | grep https) webpack --watch
scripts.build-dev: ENDPOINT=$(npm run get-endpoint-dev | grep https) webpack
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build-dev && sls client deploy --no-confirm
scripts.build-prod: ENDPOINT=$(npm run get-endpoint-prod | grep https) webpack
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build-prod && sls client deploy --no-confirm --stage=prod
